subtitle: A wonderful dish for entertaining or for that special meal.

method.text: Melt the butter and oil together ina large non-stick frying pan. Add the garlic and shallot. Saute for 2 min until softened slightly.
Add the fish. Saute for 5-6 min on each side until cooked and fish flakes easily. Remove fish, using a fish slice. Set aside and keep warm.
Add the wine, herbs, lemon rind and juice. Simmer for 2-3 min.
Mix the arrowroot to a paste with a little cold water. Add to the pan. Simmer for 1-2 min or until thickened slightly.
Spoon fish onto warmed serving plates. Pour over the sauce.

title: Panfried swordfish steak
